actions.message:
Thank you for using Cereal Bot. If you need help with this bot join our [support server](https://discord.gg/enscRtr) or call a supporter using `c?callsupport`.

Please note: A full documentation is available [here](https://cerealbot.party/documentation)!
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
`c?play` - Plays a song from YouTube (keyword search supported)
`c?skip` - Skips the current song
`c?stop` - Stop music and leaves voice channel
`c?volume` - Sets the volume to a specific level
`c?queue` - View the current song queue
`c?nowplaying` - View the current song
If you add a role called "DJ" to your server then all music commands will be limited to users with the role.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`c?definition` - The "truth" about something // Urban Dictionary (Needs to be in a NSFW channel)
`c?meme` - Sends you a random meme from r/memes
`c?userinfo` - Tells you information about a specific user
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`c?set-welcome` - Configures and enables welcome messages
`c?toggle-welcome` - Disables/Enables welcome messages again
`c?toggle-invitefilter` Toggles a discord invite link filter for non-staff members
(Requires Manage Guild permission)
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`c?kick` - Kicks a member from this server
`c?ban` - Bans a member from this server
`c?purge` - Deletes multiple messages at once
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`c?help` - Displays all available commands
`c?callsupport` - Lets a supporter join your server if you need help with me (Requires Manage Server permission)
`c?botinfo` - View information about me
`c?vote` - Checks if you have voted -> More features permanently
`c?invite` - Sends you the invite link of me

:cyclone:[Website](https://cerealbot.party) |<:cerealtag:464002772560510986> [Invite](https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=462903199909543946&scope=bot&permissions=1312124097) |<:cerealstars:464000853507047425> [Vote](https://discordbots.org/bot/cereal/vote) |<:CerealCertified:466190881343406100> [Certified](https://discordbots.org/bot/cereal)
actions.name: Add Embed Field
